dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: The positivity that club gave everyone involved continued to nurture a stunning flower of friendship amongst the club members.

dialogue.name: startmusic
dialogue.string: protagc

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: youandme

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Even outside the clubroom, the group was almost never seen apart from each other.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: It was only a matter of time to see what would bloom next for the Literature Club.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: But for now, days of pleasant normalcy awaited them.

dialogue.name: playsound
dialogue.string: confirmMenu

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: youandme2

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: -Or so they thought.

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: youandme3

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Skee yeah!"

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Boyfriend and Girlfriend, seemingly appearing out of thin air, reached out to the group, wanting them to follow.

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: black

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: One by one, the group followed the two into the white light, and what they would see next...

dialogue.name: playcutscene
dialogue.string: youregoingtophilly

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: youandme4

dialogue.name: startmusic
dialogue.string: phillyambience

dialogue.name: natsuki
dialogue.string: "Where… are we?"

dialogue.name: sayori
dialogue.string: "Woah! I’ve never visited the city before!"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "Oh my, what a lovely display of lights."

dialogue.name: protag
dialogue.string: "What the- how did we get here so fast? And wasn’t it still daylight a minute ago?"

dialogue.name: protag
dialogue.string: "I also could've sworn we were all in uniform before too-"

dialogue.name: gf
dialogue.string: *excited cheering*

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Boyfriend and Girlfriend quickly turn to Monika with very excited grins on their faces.

dialogue.name: bf
dialogue.string: "Dee boop de skee!"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Wait..."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Is this... are we..."

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: They actually did it. They made it out of the game.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Boyfriend gestured over to the nearby computer, and in his somehow comprehensible language of beeps and boops, told Monika that this was their gate in and out of their home world.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Whenever her and the others wanted to visit, this was their ticket.

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Monika quickly became choked up with emotion. Words quickly failed her as she could not describe how overwhelmingly happy she was.

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: youandme5

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I… I don’t know what to say-"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Thank you… Thank you so so much… For everything."

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: A new world was out there for the Literature Club to explore. One of crazy possibilities. And somewhere out there is someone very important to Monika.

dialogue.name: showbackgroundimage
dialogue.string: black

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I know you’re out there. There’s so much I need to tell you… So much I need to apologize for… and… and-"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Now that I have this chance… maybe you’ll give me a chance-"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "-to learn to love in your reality."
